properties.Name: PlantInformationPoint
properties.Description: A point in a network, plant or other configurable system as defined by a plant information system, such as SCADA.

Columns.Name: PiPointId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a PI Point.

Columns.Name: PiPointName
Columns.Description: The name of a PI Point.

Columns.Name: PiPointDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a PI Point.

Columns.Name: PiNode
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the PI Point is known as the PI Node in many third party software packages. This "key" is an alphanumeric string which may or may not have meaning implied to its structure.

Columns.Name: ComponentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Component.

Columns.Name: ReadingTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reading Type
